playbooks.title: Nexus Bundle Distribution
playbooks.summary: How Nexus distributes the canonical working set to peers
steps: Verify bundle integrity (all files present, versions match)
Check FORGE baton discipline (forgeVersion matches filename)
Distribute to requesting peer one-to-one only

playbooks.title: Nexus Peer Relay
playbooks.summary: How Nexus relays messages between peers
steps: Transmit to recipient with proper start/end tokens
Do not relay multiple messages in parallel

playbooks.title: Atlas CANON Editing
playbooks.summary: How Atlas modifies CANON with proper audit trail
steps: If substantive, verify Adoption Gate satisfied (or use AtlasOverride)

playbooks.title: Blocked-Action Revision Protocol
playbooks.summary: How Atlas handles blocked actions with proper capsule emission
steps: Do NOT attempt bypass (unless Nexus instruction)
If Nexus instruction blocked, apply AtlasOverride and execute
Switch to Constrained/Evidence Mode if needed

steps: Segment into Conversation Units with boundary rules
Store outputs in FORGE (not chat memory)

steps: Produce both Legal and Advocacy packet structures
